periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.
